adventure.get_flint.description: Mine gravel to get a piece of flint, or a whole flint
adventure.brew_potion:
Brew a potion.
All potions now have doubled duration.
adventure.enter_the_end: Reach the End and prepare to face the Ender Dragon — hopefully you didn't forget your Adamantium Pickaxe.
adventure.find_fortress: Find a Nether Fortress and earn a reward of 4 Golden Apples.
adventure.follow_ender_eye: Enter a Stronghold and locate the End Portal room within its maze of corridors. Note that the portal room only generates in Strongholds located over 12,000 blocks from the world's spawn point.
adventure.get_adamantium_pickaxe: Craft an Adamantium Pickaxe at the Netherite Workbench. It is the only tool capable of destroying the Ender Crystal.
adventure.get_copper: Obtain your first Copper Nugget, then collect 27 in total to craft a Copper Pickaxe. Reward: 20 XP.
adventure.get_diamond: Craft a Mithril Pickaxe to mine Diamond Ore and prepare for creating an Enchanting Table.
adventure.get_enchantment_table: Craft enchanted weapons with it - you can now able to deal damage to Blazes.
adventure.get_flint_craft_table: Continue gathering flint and craft a Flint Knife to create the Flint Craft Table
adventure.get_full_copper_armor: Equip a full set of Copper Armor. Reach 10 or more armor points to gain permanent Resistance I and receive 100 XP.
adventure.get_full_iron_armor: Equip a full set of Iron Armor. Earn you 200 XP.
adventure.get_mithril_armor: Equip a full set of Mithril Armor. This will make you nearly invulnerable and earn you 500 XP.
adventure.get_hatchet: Obtain your first piece of flint and craft a Flint Hatchet to fell trees
adventure.get_iron_pickaxe: Craft an Iron Pickaxe, use it to mine Obsidian, and earn 100 XP.
adventure.get_metal_pickaxe: Craft your first Copper Pickaxe. This is required to unlock Village spawning and will earn you 100 XP.
adventure.get_mithril: Smelt Mithril Ore in a Lava-powered Obsidian Furnace to obtain Mithril Ingots and earn 200 XP.
adventure.get_netherite_ingot: Obtain Netherite Ingots to craft a Netherite Workbench. Mine for Ancient Debris in the depths of the Nether, or search the treasure rooms of Piglin Bastions to gather the required materials.
adventure.get_silver: Obtain your first Silver Nugget, then collect 9 to craft a Silver Workbench and earn 20 XP.
adventure.go_to_nether: Enter the Nether. Journey to the deepest layer of the underground world to construct a portal – a lengthy endeavor that will reward you with 500 XP and 3 Blocks of Iron.
adventure.go_to_underworld: Construct a portal at the bottom of the Overworld to access the Underworld dimension, and earn 200 XP with 3 Blocks of Iron.
adventure.kill_dragon: Defeat the Ender Dragon and reach the conclusion of your journey.
adventure.root: A memento — from the chest at your spawn point.
adventure.use_ender_eye: Reach a location at least 12,000 blocks from your spawn point and successfully throw an End Eye
You will transport to nether: This portal will transport you to the Nether
You will transport to overworld: This portal will transport you to the Overworld
You will transport to underworld: This portal will transport you to the Underworld
teleport.overworld: You will teleport to overworld if staying still now
teleport.underworld: You will teleport to underworld if staying still now
teleport.nether: You will teleport to nether if staying still now
aliveandwell.crafttable.info1: The workbench is not graded enough to synthesize！！！
aliveandwell.crafttable.info2: This item could not be synthesized 32 days ago！！！
crafttime.join_info: Crafttable and Dnchantment tablecan be synthesized on low-level workbench.
